tool_description: Evaluates skin barrier health and integrity to assess protective function and repair needs.

trans_epidermal_water_loss.description: Skin water loss assessment (1-5, where 1=minimal loss, 5=excessive loss)

barrier_repair_time.description: Hours needed for skin to feel normal after disruption (1-72)

irritation_threshold.description: Ease of irritation (1-5, where 1=very resistant, 5=easily irritated)

error_messages: Invalid water loss scale: trans_epidermal_water_loss must be integer between 1-5.
Invalid repair time: barrier_repair_time must be integer between 1-72 hours.
Invalid irritation threshold: Must be integer between 1-5.
Invalid pH range: If provided, ph_balance must be number between 4.5-7.0.
Barrier inconsistency: High water loss should correlate with high irritation threshold.
usage: Assess how quickly skin recovers after cleansing or mild irritation. Note any persistent tightness, sensitivity, or prolonged recovery periods that indicate compromised barrier function.
